alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:50PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, Queens, Bronx, Kings and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1050 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Battery Park, or over Jersey City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jersey City, Flushing, Bayonne, Mott Haven, Hoboken, Secaucus, Ridgefield, RFK Bridge, Midtown Manhattan, Laguardia Airport, Harlem, Jackson Heights, Bay Ridge, Astoria and Lower East Side. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
